description:
nova-manage --version writes to stderr instead of stdout, while nova-mange version writes to stdout


Using Grizzly RC1
title: nova-manage --version writes to stderr instead of stdout

comments.content:
nova-manage --version writes to stderr instead of stdout, while nova-mange version writes to stdout


Using Grizzly RC1
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo

comments.content:
argparse definitely prints out in stderr - http://hg.python.org/cpython/file/default/Lib/argparse.py

Not sure if we should "fix" the way argparse works (which is tough) or fix the way "nova-manage version" works (which is easy)

thoughts?

-- dims
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dims-v

comments.content: Not sure either, perhaps this is the expected behavior, even though it is odd.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo

comments.content:
I think it's expected behaviour and there's no explanation here as to why it's a problem

nova-manage --version and nova manage version are different things
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~markmc
